en: Alright, let's see...
vi: Rồi, coi nào…

en: According to my notes...
vi: Dựa theo ghi chú thì…

en: I need to move the desks to the sides in all three classrooms.
vi: Đầu tiên phải kéo tất cả bàn học dạt sang hai bên trong cả ba lớp học.

en: Then I can draw a "path" in the middle of each one with chalk.
vi: Sau đó vẽ một “con đường” bằng phấn ở chính giữa mỗi phòng.

en: Well, I'll leave the chalk drawing for last. I want to gather everything I need first.
vi: Vẽ đường thì để cuối hẵng làm đi. Mình muốn đi kiếm các món đồ cần thiết về đây trước.

en: Oh no...
vi: Trời…

en: What are you doing...? Is this part of the ritual?
Um... what's wrong with you?
If this ritual involves the mass genocide of harmless plants, then I want nothing to do with it.
Agreed.
Are you seriously going to go around killing all the plants?
I knew you were a psychopath...
Sorry Kat, but we didn't sign up for this.
I don't like this ritual anymore...
Don't worry Kaya, we're going home now.
Don't talk to us again.
Shelves for the students to place their school bags.
vi: Kệ tủ cho học sinh để cặp táp.

en: There are no bags right now though.
vi: Mà giờ không có cái cặp nào cả.

en: Everything's ready.
All that's left is to wait 5 minutes and then burn the hair.
This is going to be such a pain to clean up.
Seriously? Stop messing with things!
But everything I "mess with" ends up being a scam.
What if some day it isn't?
What if you end up summoning some ghost or the devil and condemning your soul to an eternity in the netherworld?
What if your soul is already damned!?
Then I guess that's what's waiting for me after I die.
KAT!
It was a joke!
You're not gonna find him this way, you know?
You'll just do whatever you want no matter what I say, won't you?
It's possible.
Stubborn idiot.
I prefer "ambitious idiot".
So... will you tell me where the letter is?
You exhaust me Kat, you know that?
And yet here we are.
Fine. You win. It's in the occult club.
There's a golden envelope in one of the drawers. But they won't let you sniff around since you're not a member.
Thanks, you're the best!
Huh?
(Is there somebody at the door..?)
Alright, now I just have to blow the candles off. So let's-
vi: Được rồi, giờ chỉ cần thổi tắt nến nữa. Làm ngay nào…

en: Huh? The candles... Did they just...?
vi: Ủa? Sao nến… tự nhiên…?

en: ...I guess I should count to 100...
vi: …Chắc cứ đếm đến 100 vậy…

en: (Why am I doing this? This ridiculous game couldn't possibly work.)
vi: (Sao mình lại làm thế này nhỉ? Cái trò vớ vẩn này làm gì có chuyện.)

en: (I wonder if mom is worried about me...)
vi: (Không biết mẹ có lo không…)

en: (Huh? What was that?)
vi: (Hở? Cái gì vừa đó?)

en: (What's all that noise!?)
vi: (Tiếng động đấy tức là gì!?)

en: Is anyone there...?
vi: Ai đang đó đấy…?

en: So... I... open my eyes?
vi: Vậy… mình mở mắt ra… nhỉ?

en: It... worked?
vi: Được rồi… sao?

en: It worked?
vi: Được rồi?

en: It worked!! I can't believe it!
vi: Được rồi nè!! Ghê vậy trời!

en: This is incredible!!
vi: Hay quá hay quá!!

en: But... where am I?
vi: Nhưng mà… đây là đâu?

en: It's a... hallway? It definitely isn't the school.
vi: Hành lang… à? Rõ ràng không phải ở trường.

en: This is unbelievable, how could it have worked?
vi: Không thể tin nổi, rốt cuộc chuyện này là sao?

en: It doesn't make any logical sense. I was in the classroom a minute ago. Have I gone mad?
vi: Về logic chẳng có lý gì cả. Một phút trước là ở lớp cơ mà. Mình khùng mất rồi sao?

en: THIS IS SO EXCITING, I CAN'T BELIEVE IT WORKED!
vi: HƯNG PHẤN QUÁ NHA, THỰC SỰ LÀ ĐƯỢC RỒI ĐÂY NÈ!

en: If I wake up from this and it turns out to be a dream... well... that would be disappointing, to say the least.
vi: Giờ mà thức dậy một cái hóa ra là mơ thì… chán lắm à nha, nói chí ít là thế.

en: Okay. I definitely need to check this place out.
vi: Ô kê. Phải đi lòng vòng ngắm nghía nơi này mới được.

en: Do you wish to save your progress?
vi: Bạn muốn lưu tiến trình chứ?

en: Yes
vi: Lưu

en: No
vi: Thôi

en: Now what?
Now we just wait 5 minutes.
Doing nothing?
Peace and quiet are not as bad as you imagine.
After that, I'll burn the hair and you help me blow out the candles one by one.
Burnt hair smells bad...
It does.
But it's the last step, might as well do it right.
What happens then?
No idea.
Really?
We probably just clean up and go home. These rituals are a scam, you know?
So... you're just making us make a mess, so that we can help you clean it up?
What's the matter, are you not entertained?
...Tsk.
I think it's time.
Finally!
Now I just burn this...
Quickly, put out the candles now!
Now, shut your eyes and be quiet while I count to one hundred, okay?
Got it.
Alright then, I'll start.
Shhh!
(What the hell was that!?)
Huh...?
What the...?
Are those...?
Well... my lines aren't perfect, but it should do the job!
vi: Chà... không hoàn hảo lắm, nhưng này là đủ xài rồi đó!

en: I need to do this in all three rooms.
vi: Cần làm thế này hết cả ba phòng thì mới được.

en: Two down, one to go.
vi: Xong hai rồi, còn một thôi.

en: That night... I got cold feet, I guess.
vi: Đêm đó… mình bị nhát quá, chắc vậy.

en: I went home without completing the ritual.
vi: Nghi thức hãy chưa xong mà đã về nhà rồi.

en: Despite that, I made plans to try again.
vi: Dẫu vậy, mình đã lập kế hoạch thử sức lại.

en: However, both my notes and the letter had disappeared without a trace.
vi: Thế nhưng, cả ghi chú lẫn thư của mình đều biến mất tiêu không một dấu vết.

en: I tried telling myself that maybe the ritual was a scam anyways...
vi: Mình tự nhủ bản thân rằng cái nghi thức đó đằng nào cũng là xạo thôi mà…

en: But now... how will I ever know?
vi: Nhưng mà ngộ nhỡ… thì sao?

en: Dead End K2 - Cold Kat Feet
vi: Kết Đứt K2 – Nhát Meo

en: What's... going on?
These stairs are making no sense right now.
This building has only 3 floors. I've taken these stairs every day...
I must be really tired. I'll just go down without thinking.
I can't... get anywhere...
Am I dreaming right now?
I think I'll just... rest here.
Tomorrow morning... someone will wake me up.
Hopefully at home, in my own bed.
The next time I woke up, I was still in the same place.
I tried again. Going up, going down... it made no difference.
I decided to make an experiment with chalk.
Logic would dictate that this X isn't here if I go up or down a floor.
I'm... trapped...
I don't think I'm going to make it home tonight either...
Sorry Mom.
Dead End K3 - Academic Spiral
vi: Kết Đứt K3 – Trường Xoáy

en: And so, we went home without completing the ritual.
For some reason, I lost interest after that.
In exchange, I gained some new people to talk to.
Well, I suppose the ritual couldn't have been that important anyways.
Dead End K4 - Nevermind Forever
vi: Kết Đứt K4 – Vĩnh Mặc

en: You know, despite the rules,
every so often some moron thinks they can bring in an entire group.
Huh? Who's there?
Where is this place...?
I would have at least made it interesting for you.
But now? Forget it.
What? Wait-!
Dead End K5 - Party Wipe
vi: Kết Đứt K5 – Sạch Hội

en: Once they were gone, I felt a bit guilty so I went home as well.
Maybe I'll try the ritual again, some other time.
Next time, I hope not to run into anyone.
Dead End K6 - Snip snip
vi: Kết Đứt K6 – Xoạch Xoạch

en: And so, we left the school and walked home.
No one said anything for a while.
(I think Kat is feeling down...)
(Yeah.)
(Should we do something?)
(What's on your mind?)
(I don't know...)
(Do you think Kat likes to sing?)
(Hmmm...)
(Good idea, Saki!)
(Haven't seen you this excited about karaoke before, Kaya...)
(That's a yes, then?)
(Alright.)
So...
We were thinking of going to this place...
(I can't do this! She's ignoring me!)
Kat!
Hmm?
Come with us.
Huh?
Just come.
Sure, whatever.
(You're so good!)
(Are they trying... to cheer me up...?)
(Maybe... things are better this way.)
(I need to believe that much, at least.)
Dead End K7 - Girls' Night Out
vi: Kết Đứt K7 – Đám Nữ Chơi Đêm

en: I didn't hear from the voice again.
But, no matter how much I wanted to, I didn't scream for help.
Someone will come for me... eventually.
I just know it.
Dead End K8 - My Way
vi: Kết Đứt K8 – Đường Ta Ta Đi

en: We're... back here?
Maybe this is the school's way of saying "You can't leave now."
How can you just say something like that?
Are we going home soon...?
What are you doing? I thought you were busy.
I'm just taking a break.
Is that so...
Are you scared? You're scared, aren't you?
Did you come to us for comfort?
The only scary thing here is that attitude of yours.
She's still upset at you messing up our night, as you can see.
It's okay to be scared...
Oh, I know! Why don't you show us your ritual as an apology?
I'm kind of interested, too.
Well, the rules say...
Oh come on, you don't ACTUALLY think it's gonna work, do you? It's just a game, as you said.
The rules don't actually matter.
I suppose not.
Then it's decided, we will tag along with you.
You're tasked with entertaining us now.
Well, I suppose it can't be helped.
Let's go, then.
I'm back in this hallway...
I don't like this... I need to get out of here...
Whoa... weird dream.
Everyone must be gone already.
Looks like it's eleven... I should get to it.
Ohhhh no...
You moved it!!
I didn't, I swear! You know I hate this type of thing!
This can't possibly be happening...
It spelled "DIE"!!-
Oh my... Oh no...
Stop joking around!! This is serious!!
...Aah.... we should not have played this...
I TOLD you we're going to be cursed!!
WHAT WAS THAT!?
Is that a ghost?? We summoned a ghost!
oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god-
YOU'RE MAKING TOO MUCH NOISE
Oh...It's just Kat...
What's with the crazy knocking? What was that for!?
Did that spook you? You're not supposed to be here, you know?
I could say the same about you. Why are YOU here?
Actually...
Say hello to the new member of the occult club!
I had the wonderful opportunity to meet all of the members yesterday.
I don't recall seeing you there.
You three are not part of the club, are you?
That's funny. I didn't pin you of all people as the "occult" type, Kat.
That's because I'm not.
H-Hey!! We were doing something here!
I'll save you the trouble. All three of you moved it.
Huh?
The planchette. From your game. You all moved it. There's no ghost in the room.
There's a simple scientific explanation: it's called the ideomotor effect.
Simply put, just like your body reacts to pain reflexively, it may also react to ideas and move on its own. It pretty much bypasses the part of the brain which we use for conscious behavior.
It's not all that different from blinking or breathing. The effect is even stronger when a bunch of gullible people who are desperate to believe in ghost stories get together and play.
There was an experiment where the players were blindfolded and suddenly the "ghosts" could no longer spell messages. You can try it if you don't believe me.
In other words, your mysterious answers from beyond... are really just your imagination playing tricks on you.
Great job killing the mood.
You must be fun at parties.
Thanks a lot, Kat.
Always a pleasure.
(Alright, time to search.)
(I should go over my notes to make sure I don't forget anything.)
I already have enough chalk but... the more the merrier!
What kind of ritual is this...?
Do I really need all of this chalk...?
This window already has curtains.
The thought of its burning beauty charms you.
I really shouldn't, though.
It looks like a private journal.
This looks like that girl's private journal.
Look through it?
Yes
No
Let's see...
Blegh, it's just math problems... and girly doodles all over.
This isn't worth my time.
A math notebook. Nothing worth looking through.
(Alright, so I need to search the school for the items first.)
(The rune should be in this room...)
(...somewhere.)
Well, I need a tuft of hair for the ritual...
Should I cut my own hair?
I guess...
Forget it
Sigh...
Here I go, I suppose...
I never want to do that again.
You're so brave, Kat.
Of course not.
I already have enough hair.
(Nah.)
Um... any takers?
What do you need?
Just a bit of hair.
Why don't you cut your own?
I thought you girls wanted to participate...?
I don't mind helping...
No Kaya, you don't have to do that.
It's alright, I'll give you mine.
There's no need for that. I'll just cut some of mine.
Are you sure?
Yeah, it would be a waste to use yours.
Alright.
A tuft of hair from Saki. She gave it to me voluntarily.
Thanks!
Uuugh...
It's so dark...
Let's see what's behind this door.
Maybe we'll find exam answers!
Or dead bodies!
Or... maybe it's just a supply closet.
Heh.
